footer.text: Our clinic, which operates with the motto "Another Reason to Smile", protects your oral and dental health with modern technologies.
footer.subscribeToNewsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter and get the latest news, updates and special offers.

mainPage.professionalWhiteningTechniques: Professional whitening techniques for 3-4 shades lighter
mainPage.aboutText: DENTACAN Dental Clinic was established in 2010 by Dr. Ahmet CAN with the aim of providing modern dental services at the highest standards. Starting as a small clinic, our center has quickly reached its current position thanks to our patient-centered approach.
